name: BWOK
description:
In the not-so-distant future (or past? it doesn't really matter), humans must make the first steps to conquer space... Obviously, by sending chicken there.

Astronaut farmers raise the bwok, a mutated race of chicken, tougher, cuter, bouncier than all Earth chicken could ever dream of becoming. Why? For them to be the stars of the new spatial sports competition, BWOKBALL, a 2v2 game where participants must launch the coolest bwoks in rings to score, in an arena filled with hazards and  potential hijinks!

Want to train alone? Try downloading BWOK : ZEN MODE, a sandbox game where you play as the kind astronaut farmer who raises all the little beaked scoundrels. (Some mechanics are exclusive to each mode, but the core gameplay remains the same).

Here's a clip:

Have fun!
